NAME

META_FRAMEREGION

NEAREST API CALL

#include <windows.h>
BOOL32 FrameRgn
(
	HDC32 hdc,
	HRGN32 hrgn,
	HBRUSH32 hbrush,
	INT32 nWidth,
	INT32 nHeight
);

DESCRIPTION

U16 array noValue
0 height
1 width
2 region object no
3 brush object no
FrameRgn draws a border around region identified by the first param with the brush identified with the second param. width is the width of vertical lines, and height is the height of horizontal lines.

back
